html:
7.23.20  6:14 pm   What do you do in your free time? I assume you have lots of free time

      my time is actually very expensive

7.23.20  6:07 pm   What were your biggest inspirations when you were first starting out?

      things like pianos, calculators, pencil/paper, computers,

7.23.20  5:46 pm   serious question: what got you into music?

     music itself

     also, got any tips for music?

     it's surprisingly useful despite being completely evil

7.23.20  5:30 pm   how do you make an arrangement feel more full and less empty?  

     add too much, then it will seem too full

     i add some melody and then some chords and try to stick some bass in there and by the time the drums get in it all feels like plain bread with no real meat or energy to it

      if you start with songs that are extremely short (1 to 2 seconds) you can easily tend to it fully and make it perfect, and find out what works very quickly, because you only have a tiny span of time to work with. then make the next song slightly longer.... A crisis will set in somewhere around when you get to 18 seconds or more, but by then you will have created a lot of great recordings, so you'll have the experience needed to take on the new challenge by that point

7.23.20  5:16 pm   Can you give me an inspirational quote?

      might horse around and say my own thing instead

7.23.20  4:52 pm   Do you have any thoughts on how every month has 28-31 days instead of 30 on each?

      in the old days it was all 30 day months and then 5 extra days that were completely evil. now it's more of a thrill because it's almost impossible to tell when those evil days are, but you know they're in there somewhere

7.23.20  4:39 pm   which do you like more? your music or your info videos?

      i was thinking of combining them even more than before, and also making something totally new

7.23.20  4:05 pm   "According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyways. Because bees don't care what humans think is impossible." Thoughts?

      unfortunately, science resolved this question almost immediately after this passage was written, so by the time this film made it to the cinema the issue was moot

7.23.20  3:57 pm   please make a musical

      i will make at least 100 musicals

7.23.20  3:44 pm   Which kind of alchemy is your favorite?

      the kind that works

7.23.20  3:23 pm   Are you planning a proyect for this year?

      i don't plan projects based on years. weeks, sounds more appealing

7.23.20  3:22 pm   I love your latest song but was there a meaning in the song?

      of course, that's why i like songs

7.23.20  3:01 pm   what is sleep?

      hilarious

7.23.20  2:50 pm   I dare you to make 500 videos by the end of 2020

      i can do it by 2023

7.23.20  2:45 pm   Would you recommend seeking asylum in the Astral Realm?

      i dare you to find a single realm that's not fully and blazenly astral

7.23.20  2:24 pm   Pancakes or Waffles?

      ah, the classic cry of the person who has yet to discover waff cakes

7.23.20  2:19 pm   אפשר יהיה לנסוע מחר אחרי חמש בערב לטיילת בטבריה?

      כן, אבל אני רוצה לומר שאפשר גם לעשות את זה בשעה 5 בבוקר

7.23.20  2:13 pm   what's your favourite musical scale?

      i don't like any of them

7.23.20  1:57 pm   hi bill in the internet are theories that you are making a new video , is that right ?

      that would be sad..... 1 is such a sad sad sad sad sad sad number of videos

7.23.20  1:47 pm   what are your thoughts on reaction channels and when they react to your content

      looks like i'll have to react to their reaction. give them a taste of their own medicine

7.23.20  1:27 pm   Hello Bill are the videos on your channel starting from 'hi, i'm steve' to 'might quit' vaguely representative of each year from 1996 to 2018

      yes but much more. they also vaguely represent every other year, and other different length time frames as well

7.23.20  1:21 pm   Does Canada exist?

      yes

7.23.20  1:04 pm   do you have a favorite song that you've written?

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite

7.23.20  12:45 pm   Do you think VH1 will ever make an episode of behind the music about you?

     someone else may do it instead

      What would you want them to say right before the commercial break, when they explain how everything seemed to be going great, but there were problems lurking unseen?

      instead, would be better if it said things were going ok but they are about to go even better

7.23.20  12:02 pm   In hindsight, you should have put an announcement on your channel saying what you were working on and why you're absent. Now people think you've been working on a massive video, and some people will be disappointed when you just release a normal-length 3D video

      since when are long videos supposed to be better than normal length videos... Some of the worst videos in the world are actually very long

7.23.20  11:47 am   What's your opinion on potatoes

      the flavor overwhelms me

7.23.20  11:25 am   did they name the bill of rights after you

      bill of sale

7.23.20  11:06 am   is it too late?

      no

7.23.20  11:03 am   Is earth a cube?

      even better

7.23.20  10:43 am   what genre of music do you like

      regular

7.23.20  10:32 am   how many of the questions do you answer

      2 or 3

7.23.20  10:25 am   Do you like telephones?

      yes i love them so much

7.23.20  10:19 am   What is the best vegetable

      the earth's core

7.23.20  10:16 am   Is the fact that you ended your last song with a single chord symbolism or just a choice 

      it's part of a general policy i have of not playing 2 chords at the same time

7.23.20  10:04 am   How do you become a legend

      first just to relax your mind, think of some ideas of what a legend might be

7.23.20  10:00 am   What's the best?

      very good

7.23.20  9:38 am   Are you looking forward to something this year?

      it will be as soon as possible

7.23.20  9:27 am   What was the bad thing you did?

      tried to amount to too much

7.23.20  9:27 am   When you were in school, did you ever have to fill your locker with water to remind yourself not to climb inside and attempt to explore?

      no

7.23.20  9:19 am   whats a spoon

      it's like a bowl on a stick

7.23.20  9:17 am   how many of the references that people here make to songs you made do you understand?

     79

     
do you remember your music really?

      sometimes it is overshadowed by all the newer music i have that no one else knows about yet

7.23.20  9:17 am   What is Popcorn? 

      ridiculous

7.23.20  9:00 am   do you feel pressured to make content or are you happy to do it at your own pace?

      i am pressured from myself, and i would be extremely happy to do it at my prefered pace if that were dang even possible

7.23.20  8:49 am   What's the longest walk you've ever done?

      about 40 miles. i cheated slightly by breaking it up into 2 days

7.23.20  8:22 am   how do i get to mars

      rockets

7.23.20  8:15 am   Is Damien Maymdien from "Maybe I Could Eat Blades Of Grass" an actual balloon, or a random doodled character that looks like one?

      just an ordinary upstanding citizen really

7.23.20  8:04 am   Why does creativity inspire worship?

      creativity is the whole reason we got here

7.23.20  7:52 am   We are made of things that are made of tiny things that are mady of even tinier things, how far do you think that trail will go until we reach an end? 

      as you approach what you may have thought was the 'end', you start seeing some very interesting surprises, such as the end being the actual beginning

7.23.20  7:29 am   When was water invented? 

      i suspect somewhere around 1 to 3 billion years kelvin

7.23.20  6:20 am   your recent stuff has been more "full-length" than the ever before, is it a possibility that we might one day witness a full bill wurtz album?

      hm, think more full than that
